message.entry: The field parameter P must be a positive prime integer.
A must be a two-dimensional matrix.
B must be a column vector.
A and B must have the same number of rows.
Entries in A must be either 0 or 1 for P=2.
Entries in B must be either 0 or 1 for P=2.
Entries in B must be real nonnegative integers between 0 and P-1.
This linear equation has no solution.
Polynomial input must be represented as a row vector.
Entries in A must be real nonnegative integers between 0 and P-1.
